Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Detekt static analysis configuration

Configure Detekt plugin with formatting rules for all subprojects,
targeting common, JVM, and Android source sets.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add stub DSL/runtime modules, samples, and build-logic convention plugins

Introduce multi-module project structure with stub:dsl, stub:runtime,
and samples modules. Add build-logic convention plugins for KMP and
Android library configuration. Include Detekt config and example code.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add IR compiler plugin for createStub\(\) on all platforms

Replace expect/actual platform split with a Kotlin IR compiler plugin
that generates stub implementations at compile time. The plugin
intercepts stub<T>\(\) calls, generates synthetic classes implementing
the target interface, and delegates all methods to StubDelegate.handle\(\).

- New module: stub/compiler-plugin with IR generation extension
- New convention plugin: StubCompilerConventionPlugin
- Remove platform-specific Stub.jvm.kt, Stub.android.kt, Stub.native.kt
- Convert createStub\(\) from expect/actual to regular function with
  error fallback \(never reached when plugin is applied\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: support final class mocking via FIR status transformer

Add FirStatusTransformerExtension to open all classes, functions, and
properties at the FIR level, enabling the IR plugin to generate stub
subclasses for final classes. For non-nullable constructor parameters,
recursively construct default instances instead of passing null.

- New: StubFirStatusTransformer opens final declarations at FIR phase
- New: StubFirExtensionRegistrar registers the FIR extension
- New: collectOverridableFunctions\(\) for class method collection
- New: defaultIrValue\(\)/constructDefaultInstance\(\) for constructor args
- Modified: generateStubClass\(\) branches on interface vs class
- Modified: addConstructor\(\) delegates to target class constructor

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
